00010 /* Variables used by serial comm */
00011 unsigned int pcid = 0; // id of packet sender
00012 unsigned int aid = 0;  // id of action 
00013 unsigned int data = 0; // the variable that we received
00014 unsigned int checksum; // checksum to ensure accuracy
00015 unsigned int password = 888; // password for the packet
00016 unsigned int validBit = 0; // this is used to make sure the data we received is valid. 
00017 
00018 
00019 byte input[9];
00020 unsigned int count = 0;
00021 
00022 char ENDBIT = 42;
00023 unsigned int KEY = 415;  
00024 unsigned int BUSMASTER = 97;
00025 
00026 unsigned int BUSslave = BUSMASTER;

00028 void debugSerial(){
00029   if (Serial.available() >0){
00030     instruction *temp;
00031     temp->pcid = 0;
00032     temp->data = 0;
00033     temp->aid = Serial.read();
00034     iQ.push(*temp);
00035 
00036   }
00037 }

00042 void processSerial0Bus(){
00043 
00044   if (Serial.available()>0){ //make sure Serial bus has data in it. 
00045     input[count] = Serial.read(); //read Serial buffer
00046     //Serial.println(input[count]);
00047 
00048     if (input[count] == ENDBIT) { //check to see if we received the ENDBIT
00049 
00050         if (count > 3 && count <9) { // if we did, make sure the packet is within our limits. for an int, that means 5 digits max for a variable
00051         int helper = 0;  //needed for the conversion of ASCII to numeral
00052         pcid = input[0]; //what is the pc's id
00053         aid = input[1]; // what is the action's id
00054         checksum = input[2]; //what is the checksum
00055 
00056         for (int i = count-1 ; i >2; i--){ //This converts the bytes re received into a numeral
00057           if (input[i] > 47 && input[i] < 58){ //make sure the input data is a ASCII # value. otherwise, its a character and its useless
00058             int x = input[i]; //makes sure we convert the byte into an int. 
00059 
00061             data += (x-48) * powerOfTen( helper ); //this is what i use to convert the data into a numeral 
00062             helper++;  
00063           }
00064           else{ //if a character is found in the variable, then we discard the entire packet b/c it has been corrupted.
00065             //Serial.println("Error found in Var"); //debug
00066             validBit++;
00067           }
00068         }
00069 
00070 
00071 
00072         if (validBit == 1){
00073           aid = aid ^ 'y';
00074           //data ^= 'a';
00075           unsigned long mychecksum = pcid + aid + data + password;
00076           mychecksum %=254;
00077           //Serial.println(checksum);
00078           //Serial.println(mychecksum);
00079           //store into instruction queue.
00080           if ((pcid == BUSMASTER) && ( mychecksum == checksum)){
00081             Serial.println("I have stored your package, Bus Master");
00082 
00083 
00084 
00085             instruction *e = new instruction(pcid,aid,data);
00086 
00087             if (iQ.push( *e) == 0)
00088               Serial.println("queue full");
00089 
00090             /*
00091             iqueue[qc].add(pcid,aid,data); //= current;
00092              if (qc <25)
00093              qc++;
00094              else
00095              qc = 0;
00096              
00097              showInstructionQueue();
00098              */
00099           }
00100           else{ 
00101             Serial.println("Packet correct but you are NOT busmaster");
00102             //Serial.println(iQ.size());
00103             //int qsize = iQ.size() - 1;
00104             //for (int z = 0; z<=qsize;z++){
00105             //Serial.print(z);
00106             //Serial.print(": ");
00107             //Serial.println(iQ.pop().data);
00108             //}
00109           }
00110         }
00111         else {
00112           Serial.print("Error found in Variable. #of bad data:");
00113           Serial.println(validBit);
00114           //Serial.println(data); 
00115         }
00116 
00117         //reset all our data
00118         data = 0;
00119         count = 0; // reset counter 
00120         validBit = 1;
00121 
00122       }
00123 
00124       else {
00125         count = 0; //this
00126         Serial.println("BADPACKET RCVD");
00127         //Serial.println(data, DEC);
00128         //Serial.println(count);
00129         Serial.print("Popping:");
00130         Serial.println(iQ.pop().data);
00131 
00132       }
00133     }
00134     else{
00135       if (count >8)
00136         Serial.println("packet too long. Please reset with *");
00137       count++;
00138     }
00139   }
00140 
00141 }
